name: iNet Media
tagline: Calgary Website and Online Marketing Specialists
description:
iNet Media is a full-service Digital Marketing Agency, specializing in Website Design/Development, Search Engine Optmization (SEO), Pay-Per-Click (PPC) Advertizing, Online Display, Reputation Management and Social Media Marketing. Our team has been helping businesses with their digital marketing since the mid 1990's.
 
Our agency was founded with a philosophy on changing the way businesses market themselves and how they interact with their clients online. iNet Media's team possesses over 130 years of experience in Website Development, Digital Marketing and Communication experience. Our team's focus and attention is placed on meeting and exceeding our client's goals and providing measurable solutions, tailored specifically for each client. Our passion, expertise and execution is apparent with every client and project.
